channel.title: Issue with Client
channel.description:
I Downloaded a source and have a couple clients to run it.
They're 317.
Both Clients, when I run them comes up with errors about java, too much to type.
It says this inside the "Run"
[code]@echo off TITLE Run JAVA -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause[/code]
Is there anything else I can do to this Batch files to may em work?
I'm not a huge expert on this.

item.title: Issue with Client
item.dc:creator: @Swiftymcfeat Swiftymcfeat
item.description:
@Swiftymcfeat wrote:

I have a guide for this on my forums, too bad i can’t advertise

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with Client
item.dc:creator: @ghostkid303 ghostkid303
item.description:
@ghostkid303 wrote:

Your java path and class path is set incorrectly, here is a guide on how to fix this problem.

NOTE: change 1.6.0 to whatever version you have, and if your java is on a different hard drive, you can change it as well.

Go to your system information and go to advanced, then go to environmental variables.

Ok now find the variable called “path” in the list in that new screen open. Rename it to “PATH” and then for
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\

Now make a new variable under SYSTEM VARIABLES called CLASSPATH Now add this in for it’s value:
C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\

Read full topic
